original_prompt: Prepare a brief for my upcoming meeting with customer Beta and include a dossier for each customer attendee and the topics they are most interested in. Include a background on their company.

gutts.name: Generate Meeting Brief
gutts.capability: Produce a concise briefing document outlining the meetingâ€™s purpose, agenda, objectives, key discussion points, and any preparatory notes.
gutts.user_goal: Provide a ready-to-use brief for the upcoming meeting with customer Beta.

gutts.name: Compile Company Background

gutts.name: Create Attendee Dossiers with Topics of Interest
gutts.capability: Generate a dossier for each customer attendee that includes their name, role, responsibilities, contact information, and the topics they are most interested in.
gutts.user_goal: Provide individualized dossiers for each attendee with their key interests for the meeting.
